description: Test cases for the Team class involving image input and interaction with agents, using the OpenAIChat model, verifying session storage and message content.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a specific role and model, capable of interacting within the team.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image media object with a URL.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents capable of running prompts and managing sessions.

methods.name: test_team_image_input
methods.description: Test the team run with an image input and verify session storage and message details.

methods.name: test_team_image_input_no_prompt
methods.description: Test the team run with an image input and a message prompt, verifying session storage and message details.
